archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Evaluate Loyalty Program
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Analyze the performance of an existing loyalty program to identify inadequacies and required improvements.

properties.value: Evaluate Loyalty Program Assess analyzes the performance of an existing loyalty program to identify inadequacies and required improvements. The process uses information from loyalty program participants, defined program Key Quality/Performance Indicators, and feedback from operational activities to identify required improvements.
